chapter.text: You push the door open and walk into the room. ^1500The dim light from the outside halts at the door, still unable to see much around you. ^1500You try closing the door slightly to block some of the light, but the door swings close with a loud bang. ^1500In a panic, you grab the door handle and run back outside. ^1500You stand outside practice room A. ^1500You turn around to face the room you just left. ^1500The door is closed. ^1500You reach for the handle and turn it. ^1500Locked.
